item.description:
Let's meet up at Margarita's - Waltham before seeing Argo around  the block. They are known for their Mexican food and Margaritas drinks so bring an appetite! You can just come for dinner, if you don't want to see the movie!

 

Note I do not know if Cathy is going so just meet at Margaritas Mexican Restaurant at 211 Moody Street Waltham, MA telephone (781) 893-9990

since they can easily accommodate large groups like 8 of you!.I have not booked anything so when you get there ask for a table for 8 and wait or sit in 2 smaller groups tables of 4 each. Unless Alison you want to book it a table for 8 just in case?..Sorry i cannot make it!
item.name: Pre Movie Dinner
